post.title: Compliments for a Girl.
post.descript: “You’re basically a real life version of a Disney princess.”

post.title: Best Compliments for Anyone.
post.descript: “You’re a natural at whatever you do!”

post.title: Best Compliments for Anyone
post.descript: “You set such a good example for your kids.”

post.title: Best Compliments for Anyone
post.descript: “It’s too bad every boss can’t be like you.”

post.title: Best Compliments for Anyone.
post.descript: “I wish I could figure things out as quickly as you do.”

post.title: Best Compliments for Anyone
post.descript: “You’re so kind everyone instantly feels like your friend.”

post.title: Best Compliments for Anyone
post.descript: “I love your confidence. Can you send some of it my way?”

post.title: Best Compliments for Anyone
post.descript: “I love how you decorated your house. It looks like it belongs on HGTV.”

post.title: Best Compliments for Anyone
post.descript: “I wish I were half of the human you are.”

post.title: Best Compliments for Anyone
post.descript: “I love how you can turn even the most simple situation into something fun.”

post.title: Best Compliments for Anyone
post.descript: “You’re so kind that you make everyone around you a better person.”

post.title: Best Compliments for Anyone
post.descript: “You’re the sweetest—you don’t have a mean bone in your body do you?”

post.title: Best Compliments for Anyone
post.descript: “You’re better than a triple-scoop ice cream cone…with sprinkles.”

post.title: Best Compliments for Anyone
post.descript: “You’re the bravest person I know! I wish I was more like you.”

post.title: Compliments for a Guy
post.descript: “I’d marry you over and over again. You’re the best.”
